Parameters.Parameter: Tiles by Stamen Design, under CC-BY 3.0. Data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors, under ODbL.

Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT geometry, name FROM osm_admin WHERE geometry && !bbox! AND type = 'administrative' AND admin_level = 4 ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas_z13 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas_z10 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas_z13 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas_z10 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT osm_id, name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_buildings WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_buildings_z13 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry FROM osm_aeroways WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas_z13 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_water_areas_z10 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas_z13 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _
( SELECT name, type, geometry, area FROM osm_green_areas_z10 WHERE geometry && !bbox! ) AS _

(SELECT geometry, (CASE WHEN highway = 'motorway' THEN '' ELSE name END) AS name, (CASE WHEN highway = 'motorway' AND CHAR_LENGTH(ref) BETWEEN 2 AND 15 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(ref, E'\s*;\s*', E' / ', 'g') ELSE '' END) AS ref, (CASE WHEN highway = 'motorway' AND CHAR_LENGTH(ref) BETWEEN 2 AND 15 THEN CHAR_LENGTH(ref) ELSE 0 END) AS ref_length, highway, ST_Length(geometry) AS length, (CASE WHEN highway IN ('motorway', 'motorway_link') THEN 0 WHEN highway IN ('footpath', 'track', 'footway', 'steps', 'pedestrian', 'path', 'cycleway') THEN 1 WHEN railway IN ('rail', 'spur', 'subway', 'light_rail', 'tram', 'abandoned', 'disused', 'monorail') THEN 2 WHEN highway IN ('trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link') THEN 3 WHEN highway = 'secondary' THEN 4 WHEN highway = 'tertiary' THEN 5 ELSE 9 END) AS priority, (CASE WHEN highway IN ('secondary', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'motorway', 'motorway_link') THEN 'major_road' WHEN highway IN ('residential', 'unclassified', 'service', 'minor', 'road', 'tertiary') THEN 'minor_road' WHEN railway IN ('rail', 'spur', 'subway', 'light_rail', 'tram', 'abandoned', 'disused', 'monorail') THEN 'rail' WHEN highway IN ('footpath', 'track', 'footway', 'steps', 'pedestrian', 'path', 'cycleway') THEN 'path' ELSE '' END) AS kind, (CASE WHEN tunnel = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END) AS is_tunnel, (CASE WHEN bridge = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END) AS is_bridge FROM osm_roads WHERE highway IN ('secondary', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'motorway', 'motorway_link') ORDER BY priority ASC, length DESC) AS _

(SELECT geometry, name, highway, ST_Length(geometry) AS length, (CASE WHEN highway IN ('motorway', 'motorway_link') THEN 0 WHEN highway IN ('footpath', 'track', 'footway', 'steps', 'pedestrian', 'path', 'cycleway') THEN 1 WHEN railway IN ('rail', 'spur', 'subway', 'light_rail', 'tram', 'abandoned', 'disused', 'monorail') THEN 2 WHEN highway IN ('trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link') THEN 3 WHEN highway = 'secondary' THEN 4 WHEN highway = 'tertiary' THEN 5 ELSE 9 END) AS priority, (CASE WHEN highway IN ('secondary', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'motorway', 'motorway_link') THEN 'major_road' WHEN highway IN ('residential', 'unclassified', 'service', 'minor', 'road', 'tertiary') THEN 'minor_road' WHEN railway IN ('rail', 'spur', 'subway', 'light_rail', 'tram', 'abandoned', 'disused', 'monorail') THEN 'rail' WHEN highway IN ('footpath', 'track', 'footway', 'steps', 'pedestrian', 'path', 'cycleway') THEN 'path' ELSE '' END) AS kind, (CASE WHEN tunnel = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END) AS is_tunnel, (CASE WHEN bridge = 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END) AS is_bridge FROM osm_roads WHERE highway IN ('residential', 'unclassified', 'service', 'minor', 'road', 'tertiary') ORDER BY priority ASC, length DESC) AS _
(SELECT geometry, name, railway, highway, 'M' as label FROM osm_stations WHERE railway IN ('station') OR highway IN ('bus_stop')) AS _
